quote: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
author: Unknown

quote: An apology is a lovely perfume; it can transform the clumsiest moment into a gracious gift.
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quote: In this life, when you deny someone an apology, you will remember it at time you beg forgiveness..
author: Toba Beta

quote: An apology is a good way to have the last word.
author: Unknown

quote: Never make a defense or an apology until you are accused.
author: King Charles I

quote: The only good thing about punctuality is that it usually gets you an apology.
author: Unknown

quote: Would ‘sorry’ have made any difference? Does it ever? It’s just a word. One word against a thousand actions.
author: Sarah Ockler

quote: I am the wisest man alive, for I know one thing, and that is that I know nothing.
author: Plato

quote:
Never forget the nine most important words of any family-
I love you.
You are beautiful.
Please forgive me.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Never apologize for showing your feelings. When you do, you are apologizing for the truth.
author: Jose N. Harris

quote: An apology is the super glue of life. It can repair just about anything.
author: Lynn Johnston

quote: My life is an apology for the life of my father.
author: Kristin Cashore

quote: I’m sorry.’ The two most inadequate words in the English language.
author: Beth Revis

quote: An apology given just to appease one’s conscience is self-serving and better left unspoken!
author: Evinda Lepins

quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
author: J.R.R.Tolkien

quote: Sacrifice is at the heart of repentance. Without deeds, your apology is worthless.
author: Bryan Davis

quote: An apology can be a wonderful thing so long as it is infrequent and from the heart. However, beware of the person who justifies bad behavior with apologies. For them it is a means to an end, and quite often at your expense.
author: Gary Hopkins

quote: An apology for the devil: it must be remembered that we have heard one side of the case. God has written all the books.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: More people should apologize, and more people should accept apologies when sincerely made.
author: Greg LeMond

quote: Right actions in the future are the best apologies for bad actions in the past.
author: Tyron Edwards

quote: An apology might help, but you can change your life without one.
author: Robin Quivers

quote: Friends are God’s apology for relations..
author: Hugh Kingsmill

quote: A hero is someone we can admire without apology.
author: Kitty Kelley

quote: It will never do to plead sin as an excuse for sin, or to attempt to justify sinful acts by pleading that we have an evil heart. This instead of being a valid apology, is the very ground of our condemnation.
author: Archibald Alexander

quote: Nothing wrong with apologizing, but saying I’m sorry does nothing when you continue to make the same mistakes..
author: Unknown

quote: Forgiveness is the sweetest revenge.
author: Isaac Friedmann

quote: Some people accidentally walk on your feet and apologize, while others walk all over your heart and don’t even realize.
author: Unknown

quote: In some families, please is described as the magic word. In our house, however, it was sorry..
author: Margaret Laurence

quote: Saying sorry to someone is hard… but putting your pride down for someone is the hardest.
author: Cristina Orante

quote: A person can apologize endlessly, and even if you forgive them, sometimes you can’t forget the pain they’ve caused you.
author: Nishan Panwar

quote: Never apologize for having high standards. People who really want to be in your life will rise up to meet them..
author: Suman Rai

quote: Any good apology has 3 parts: 1)I’m sorry 2)It’s my fault 3)What can I do to make it right? Most people forget the third part.
author: Unknown

quote: You can always say sorry, But the real apology is when you hear the sadness in their voice and see the look in their eyes. And you realize that they have hurt themselves just as much..
author: Kid Cudi

quote: I understand the concept of being the bigger person but I do not understand why some people apologize to others when they weren’t wrong.
author: Unknown

quote: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
author: Paul Boese

quote: True friends stab you in the front.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: True remorse is never just a regret over consequence; it is a regret over motive.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: A stiff apology is a second insult…. The injured party does not want to be compensated because he has been wronged; he wants to be healed because he has been hurt.
author: G. K. Chesterton

quote: I’m sorry you’re angry” is NOT an apology.
author: ” – Lisa Lutz

quote: Pride and ego makes a mockery of an apology. Humility wins forgiveness without question…so break ‘yo’self’!
author: T. F. Hodge

quote: Accept everything about yourself – I mean everything, You are you and that is the beginning and the end – no apologies, no regrets.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: Apologies only account for that which they do not alter.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The ability of a person to atone has always been the most remarkable of human features.
author: Leon Uris

quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us.  That’s why it’s a comfort to go hand in hand.
author: Emily Kimbrough

quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
author: Unknown

quote: The more rational statement is that we feel sorry because we strike, afraid because we tremble, and not that we cry, strike, or tremble because we are sorry, angry, or fearful as the case may be.
author: William James

quote: You can make up a quarrel, but it will always show where it was patched.
author: Edgar Watson Howe

quote: Maturity is the ability to reap without apology and not complain when things don’t go well.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The only correct actions are those that demand no explanation and no apology.
author: Red Auerbach

quote: The most important trip you may take in life is meeting people halfway.
author: Henry Boye
